resolved: Discount of a fixed % where xx represents the discount. E.g. DSCNT-15 would represent a discount of 15%
Buy 1 and get another of the same item free
Buy 1 and get another of the same item xx % off. E.g. BUY1G-5-OFF would represent an offer where if a customer buys 1 item they get 5% off the next item
